Sorry I may have overreacted a little. some of the others and I were discus=
sing something and the character came up. about a week later you name your =
gestault the same name. It seemed to much to be a coincidence I'm sure you =
understand. Maximus Prime was my crown and joy in a RPG I was in with about=
 20 others. I may one day introduce this RPG to him so please change the na=
me. (If you want information on my version let me know over IM. )
  ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Monday, February 12, 2001 5:24 PM
  Subject: OOC to Cyberwolf

=

  OOC: Im sorry, I had no idea that you had a character called Maximus Pri=
me.   
  I'll change my gestalts name if you want, but you dont have to cal=
l me thief. 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              
              ww=
w.
